title: #038 - Behind the Scenes of the Publishing World with Cara Alwill Leyba
itunes:title: #038 - Behind the Scenes of the Publishing World with Cara Alwill Leyba
description:
In the 38th episode, we welcome Cara Alwill Leyba, best selling author, master life coach, and creator of The Champagne Diet blog. I love her because she encourages women to live their most effervescent lives, celebrate themselves every day, and make their happiness a priority. In this episode she shares how she found her passion life and developed the followers that make her successful today, she talks all about the behind the scenes of the publishing world, and she shares some advice for up and coming authors that you won't want to miss. 

3 Key Points:

  1. Sometimes finding your path means moving in the direction of your passions without seeing the clear path.
  2. The modern day publisher is based on having a following.
  3. The best way to build your following is to be authentic.
